root.name: Fired Up
root.description: Story A force known only as "The Republic" invades a small European country. The Republic meets little resistance in taking over the county. Addo, an insurgent from Ghana living in Capital City decides to fight back against The Republic.Characters Adoo was born in Ghana. He was currently living in Capital City when The Republic invaded. Surprising the citizens of Capital City, he decides to fight back again The Republic. Unknown to the citizens of Capital City, Addo is working for a Texan oil company, helping them secure contracts overseas. The Republic have been their biggest enemies.
